description:
Part A: Nakajima and Sakamaki work in a certain office and one day, Sakamaki offers to take Nakajima to a certain place for lunch. The place happened to be a club named “Daydream” that was in the basement of the same building that their office was in. There, Nakajima meets Moguro and is warned, but ends up falling for a pretty hostess named Haruka.
Part B: Mitsuko had been shopping excessively in order to relieve the stress she was feeling from work. One day while she was out shopping, Moguro talks to her. Despite having some doubts, she ends up taking up his invitation and meets him at Bar Ma no Su...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daydream / Make a Budget and Stick to It
Rêve éveillé – Un contrat est un contrat
白昼夢 / ご利用は計画的に
